title: Enhancing GIPHY Search with Google Cloud ML Tools
description: Editor’s Note: Earlier this week our Director of Engineering, Nick Hasty, was a guest author on the Google Cloud Big Data and ML blog. Nick touched on the use of Google Cloud Machine Learning to analyze and tag our GIFs, ultimately making it easier to find the perfect GIF on GIPHY. The following blog post […]

title: Introducing search-string: an advanced search string parser
description:
search-string is a new open source minimalist npm package for parsing and managing GMail style advanced search strings.
